articles.title: Pentagon says it’s cutting ties with ‘woke’ Harvard, discontinuing military training, fellowships
articles.description:
Hegseth wrote, “Harvard is woke; The War Department is not.”

The post Pentagon says it’s cutting ties with ‘woke’ Harvard, discontinuing military training, fellowships appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Pentagon ends military training and fellowships with Harvard University as of February 2026.
This decision affects approximately 200 Harvard students involved in military programs.
Local military recruitment efforts may decline due to reduced collaboration with Harvard.
